com.shsrobotics.reinforcementlearning.util

Class VarianceMinimizer

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.shsrobotics.reinforcementlearning.util.Optimizer
      • com.shsrobotics.reinforcementlearning.util.VarianceMinimizer

  •  class VarianceMinimizer
extends Optimizer
    For use in RandomDecisionTree. Minimizes entropy by changing split parameters.

        Calculate the variance of a node split.

        Parameters:
        split - the cutoff value to split the data with.
        Returns:
        the average of the variance for each branch.
